kams.name: Sarah Williams
coachingNeeds: Reduce OOS incidents on Adult Nutrition in Tesco
Strengthen value messaging vs Boots own label

kams.name: Laura Chen
coachingNeeds: Expand Vitamins educational materials in Leeds
Leverage Immunity+ lifestyle imagery more consistently

calls.transcriptSnippet: Great, we can commit to two extra facings on Immunity+ next week. The POS looked strong last time.
aiHighlights: Follow-up to verify execution in next visit
calls.coachingNotesSuggested: Prepare visual proof of lift from similar store to reinforce execution urgency.

transcript.speaker: CAM
transcript.text: Thanks David—I'd like to review Immunity+ placement and propose adding two facings.

transcript.speaker: Manager
transcript.text: If the POS looks clean and we don't lose vitamins space, I'm open to it.

transcript.speaker: CAM
transcript.text: Great, we brought the new winter POS—clean layout and educational callouts.

transcript.speaker: Manager
transcript.text: Let's do two extra facings next week. Can you send me a one-pager?

transcript.speaker: CAM
transcript.text: Absolutely—I'll send a proof pack and check lift a week after execution.

calls.transcriptSnippet: We had Boost Plus Vanilla OOS for three days—I've placed an emergency order and flagged DC availability.
aiHighlights: Risk of recurrence without safety stock
Opportunity to align promo timing with stock
calls.coachingNotesSuggested: Coach on proactive safety-stock thresholds and early DC signal checks.

actionItems.text: Set safety-stock threshold for Boost Plus Vanilla
Align promo schedule with DC availability

transcript.speaker: CAM
transcript.text: Wanted to flag Boost Plus Vanilla—three days OOS last week.

transcript.speaker: Manager
transcript.text: We had a delivery hiccup; what do you recommend?

transcript.speaker: CAM
transcript.text: Emergency order already placed; propose a safety-stock floor and promo alignment with DC.

transcript.speaker: Manager
transcript.text: Makes sense—send me the thresholds and I'll add to SOP.

calls.transcriptSnippet: The leaflet stand near the checkout increased Vitamin D3 questions—staff training helped convert.
aiHighlights: Staff training cited by manager as key
calls.coachingNotesSuggested: Encourage peer share of training outline and customer Q&A script.

actionItems.text: Share training outline and Q&A script

transcript.speaker: CAM
transcript.text: How did the leaflet stand perform near checkout?

transcript.speaker: Manager
transcript.text: Questions increased, and staff training helped close sales on D3.

transcript.speaker: CAM
transcript.text: Great—I'll share the training outline and a quick Q&A script.
